about_the_game:
For the Munchkin who has everything! Pixels & Paper Promos introduces five exciting new cards that you can use to destroy your enemies and irritate your friends!



Includes:
  • Redi-Flow: Get ready for the hurt-gun fight.
  • Box of Air: It's not empty...it's FULL of air!
  • Mecha Dire Wolf: C'mon...it's not that scary!
  • Exclusive: There can be only one. (Your mom always said you were special!)
  • Steam Code: Just open up the valve...
detailed_description:
For the Munchkin who has everything! Pixels & Paper Promos introduces five exciting new cards that you can use to destroy your enemies and irritate your friends!



Includes:
  • Redi-Flow: Get ready for the hurt-gun fight.
  • Box of Air: It's not empty...it's FULL of air!
  • Mecha Dire Wolf: C'mon...it's not that scary!
  • Exclusive: There can be only one. (Your mom always said you were special!)
  • Steam Code: Just open up the valve...

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 13
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8600M GT (256 MB) or ATI Radeon HD 2600 Pro (256 MB)
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OSX 13
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 650M (1 GB) or ATI Radeon HD 5670 (512 MB) or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

name: Munchkin Digital - Pixels & Paper Promos

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64bit version only)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2400 or AMD Ryzen 3 2200G
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 2000 graphics or Vega 8 graphics
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or better (64bit version only)
  • Processor: NVIDIA GeForce 8800 GT (512 MB) or ATI Radeon HD 4850 (512 MB) or better
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX11 or OpenGL 3.x capabilities
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
